name: whigi-client
description: A front-end for Whigi and Whigi-restore
author: Whigi-team

scripts.build_module: node_modules/.bin/tsc --experimentalDecorators --emitDecoratorMetadata --removeComments app/app.module.ts && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.build_main: node_modules/.bin/tsc --experimentalDecorators --emitDecoratorMetadata --removeComments app/main.ts && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.build: npm run build_vendor && npm run build_polyfill && npm run build_module && npm run build_main && npm run dist
scripts.build_vendor: node_modules/.bin/tsc app/vendor.ts && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.build_polyfill: node_modules/.bin/tsc app/polyfill.ts && echo ok || echo not ok
